summary: A multiverse  is the theory of a set of multiple possible universes, including our universe, which make up reality.
full_text: The multiverse  is the hypothetical set of infinite or finite possible universes  that together comprise everything that exists: the entirety of space, time, matter, and energy as well as the physical laws and constants that describe them. The various universes within the multiverse are also called "parallel universes" or "alternate universes".
title: Multiverse
